missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} The mission will progress when the docking clamp controls have been deactivated and the pilot has been retrieved.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
missionProperties.startingObjective: Find and release the docking clamp controls. Find and rescue the pilot.
missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block access to the docking clamps control and the pilot.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

While refueling your ship, you were taken into custody on suspicion of criminal activity. All of your documentation was up-to-date. Though you considered blasting everything in
sight, your pilot assured you that he could talk his way out of it.

That was three hours ago, so you decide to sneak out of the waiting room. After a few minutes of looking around, you arrive in an observation area just in time to see your pilot thrown in to an animal pen. Fearsome beasts prowl around, baring razor-sharp teeth at his unconscious form.

And to make things worse, your ship is still locked tight by the docking clamps.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} The mission will progress when the docking clamp controls have been deactivated and the pilot has been retrieved.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

The pilot is a bit overzealous as he showers the area in blaster cannon fire before setting the ship down. His face is grim, and he says nothing but a curt, "Thanks," as everyone climbs into the transport.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!

You scramble out into the desert, keenly aware that the Imperials are now ripping your ship apart, piece by piece. Everything that was on your ship-flight records, messages, the positions of key operatives will soon be in their hands.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 2. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 100 credits per hero to prevent this.
You open the door to the Control Room only to find yourself face to face with the guards.
Hot desert air makes you choke as you open the door. Nearby, beasts snarl aggressively.

eventActions.repositionInstructions: Place yourself on top of the pilot.
Place yourself on top of the pilot.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the terminal.

Test {I} or {J} and enter the number of successes below. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens from the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You fail to overcome the security protocols. You need to keep trying.

{-} For each {B} result, place 1 strain token on the terminal.

events.eventText: You manage to release the docking clamps.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The terminal controls the docking clamps.

A hero can interact with the docking clamp controls to try and deactivate them.

events.eventText:
Your pilot has clearly been through a lot, but doesn't seem to be seriously hurt.

{-} Apply -1 to the Speed and -1 {G} to the defense results of a hero carrying the pilot.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Your pilot lies motionless on the ground, unconscious.

A hero can retrieve the pilot. Apply -1 to the Speed and -1 {G} to the defense results of a hero carrying the pilot.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The mission will progress when the docking clamp controls have been deactivated and the pilot has been retrieved.
{-} Apply -1 to the Speed and -1 {G} to the defense results of a hero carrying the pilot.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
In pretty bad shape, your pilot slowly awakens. You fill him in on the situation.

"Okay, with the docking clamps released, all we need to do is get to the ship." He winces, holding his wounded side. "Oh, they are going to pay for this ..." he says through clenched teeth.

{-} Apply -1 to the Speed and -1 {G} to the defense results of a hero carrying the pilot.
{-} A hero carrying the pilot can interact with the hatch for the pilot to depart.
{-} The Rebels win when the pilot departs.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The hatch leads to the landing bay where your ship is being held.

A hero carrying the pilot can interact with the hatch for the pilot to depart, ending the mission.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Apply -1 to the Speed and -1 {G} to the defense results of a hero carrying the pilot.
{-} A hero carrying the pilot can interact with the hatch for the pilot to depart.
{-} The Rebels win when the pilot departs.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: This door leads out of the animal pen.

mapEntities.mainText: This door leads out of the animal pen.

Your pilot lies motionless on the ground, unconscious.

A hero can retrieve the pilot. Apply -1 to the Speed and -1 {G} to the defense results of a hero carrying the pilot.

The hatch leads to the landing bay where your ship is being held.

A hero carrying the pilot can interact with the hatch for the pilot to depart, ending the mission.

The terminal controls the docking clamps.

A hero can interact with the docking clamp controls to try and deactivate them.
